function bitmask = getbitmask(bitlevel)
bitmask=fi(0,0,32,28);
switch(bitlevel)
    case 0
        bitmask = fi(0.0000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 1
        bitmask = fi(8.0000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 2
        bitmask = fi(12.0000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 3
        bitmask = fi(14.0000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 4
        bitmask = fi(15.0000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 5
        bitmask = fi(15.5000000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 6
        bitmask = fi(15.7500000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 7
        bitmask = fi(15.8750000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 8
        bitmask = fi(15.9375000000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 9
        bitmask = fi(15.9687500000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 10
        bitmask = fi(15.9843750000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 11
        bitmask = fi(15.9921875000000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 12
        bitmask = fi(15.9960937500000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 13
        bitmask = fi(15.9980468750000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 14
        bitmask = fi(15.9990234375000000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 15
        bitmask = fi(15.9995117187500000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 16
        bitmask = fi(15.9997558593750000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 17
        bitmask = fi(15.9998779296875000000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 18
        bitmask = fi(15.9999389648437500000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 19
        bitmask = fi(15.9999694824218750000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 20
        bitmask = fi(15.9999847412109375000000000000,0,32,28);
    case 21
        bitmask = fi(15.9999923706054687500000000000,0,32,28);
    case 22
        bitmask = fi(15.9999961853027343750000000000,0,32,28);
    case 23
        bitmask = fi(15.9999980926513671875000000000,0,32,28);
    case 24
        bitmask = fi(15.9999990463256835937500000000,0,32,28);
    case 25
        bitmask = fi(15.9999995231628417968750000000,0,32,28);
    case 26
        bitmask = fi(15.9999997615814208984375000000,0,32,28);
    case 27
        bitmask = fi(15.9999998807907104492187500000,0,32,28);
    case 28
        bitmask = fi(15.9999999403953552246093750000,0,32,28);
    case 29
        bitmask = fi(15.9999999701976776123046875000,0,32,28);
    case 30
        bitmask = fi(15.9999999850988388061523437500,0,32,28);
    case 31
        bitmask = fi(15.9999999925494194030761718750,0,32,28);
    case 32
        bitmask = fi(15.9999999962747097015380859375,0,32,28);
end
